runs.comm: a bit of inswing as this pitched on middle and Shehzad defended it on the on side
on the leg stump this time, tucked to midwicket
slightly back of length outside off, Shehzad cuts it off the back foot to point
on length and closer to off, the batsman stays back and drives it to point

and Lopsy strikes! He kept with the line outside off, tempted Shehzad to drive and he did without any footwork. Thick edge goes to slip and Amla takes it on his left for a good catch as this was going fast
back of length on middle, Afridi defends it on leg
Maqsood drives and a thick outside off the away-going length delivery outside off goes past slip for four
hint of outswing again on length outside off, pushed firmly to cover
slightly shorter on the stumps, pushed down to mid-on

another edge - another wicket! Pakistan lose Maqsood now. It shaped away as usual after pitching outside off and Maqsood poked without any footwork to edge it to the keeper. Easy catch for de Kock. Pakistan 4 for 2
comes into him after pitching and Hafeez steers it to midwicket

and one more! Hafeez falls to Steyn again. There were two slips for him and Hafeez stayed back to cut this outswinger to the keeper. It was a back of length delivery and Hafeez didn't move much to give catching practice to de Kock
well outside off and Afridi goes for a wild heave to send this out of the park and misses
connects this time. Slightly fuller from Tsotsobe and Afridi goes after it again to launch this well over mid-off for a four
Afridi makes room, Tsotsobe pitches it up close to off and a thick outside edge rushes to third man
on length outside off, Malik defends off the back foot
wider outside off on length, left by Malik
much closer to off on length and angling away, Malik looks at it and leaves
back of length outside off, shapes away after pitching and Afridi pokes as it just misses the outside edge
fuller and outside off, Afridi gets a big heave and a leading edge to the third man area where there is nobody in the deep and they get two
down leg this time and Afridi tucks it to deep midwicket
keep straight after pitching around off from length and Malik defends it to mid-on
fuller around off with late outswing, Malik gets an edge towards cover where McLaren dives to his left to stop it
on middle this time with outswing again, Malik drives and gets an outside edge to third man
on length outside off, Malik gets an edge to midwicket
back of length on the stumps, Malik defends off his toes
shorter and outside off, Malik cuts off the back foot but manages a bottom edge to the keeper after a bounce
on length around off, Malik doesn't have room this time and defends
well outside off, Malik goes for a half-hearted drive and it misses the outside edge
angling away from off, Malik defends with soft hands on off but can't get the single
back of length outside off, Afridi tries to slap it on leg but misses
fuller outside off, turned towards mid-on off the back foot
sways down the leg side for a wide
short of length outside off, Malik defends it back to the bowler
moves to the off side and drives this full delivery from outside off to deep midwicket boundary and Steyn cuts it back to save a run
bouncer for Afridi who pulls but misses and that's one for the over
full toss outside off but Afridi can't put it away. Gets it to midwicket where Amla stops it
on length outside off, Malik stays back and cuts it late to third man
close to off on length, Afridi runs it down to third man
fuller outside off, Malik leans towards it and drives past cover for one

Tsotsobe gets Afridi now - he pitched it short, Afridi pulled the bouncer and there was a deep backward square leg just for this. McLaren runs to his left and dives forward to complete a well-judged catch as Afridi falls in the trap
length delivery on the pads, tucked to deep fine leg for one
length delivery outside off, left alone by Akmal
back of length outside off, cuts it late to third man
short ball outside off, Akmal moves across and tucks it to the leg side off his toes for one
falls short of Tahir. Short ball again, Malik pulled and couldn't middle it as it reached Tahir at deep fine leg after a bounce
delicately played for four. It was outside off, no slip in place and Akmal opened the face of the bat late to send it for for fine on the off side
shorter and wider, Akmal poked instead of cutting or leaving it and missed
works this one to third man from well outside off for one
length ball around middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
back of length on middle, tucked to deep midwicket off the back foot
full outside off, driven down to mid-off
angled into the batsman from back of length, Akmal takes a step down and finds the gap between mid on and midwicket to send it for four
bangs it short outside off from wide of the crease, defends by jumping on his toes
another short one, Akmal want to put some bat but withdraws it at the last moment
on length outside off, cut to the off side
almost taken by Tahir! Malik came down and pushed this one own the ground and it went right through Tahir's legs as he couldn't get down on time
flighted on off, leans forward and turns it to square leg
short ball down the leg side, pushed towards deep midwicket for one
slower through the air around off, turned to deep midwicket

Tahir also strikes in his first over and that too off a wide! Malik came down the track again and Tahir pitched it way outside off, out of the batsman's reach and de Kock collected and whipped the bails off. No chance of Malik making it back
flatter on off, defends it on the off side
full toss outside off, driven to mid-off for a single
pitches it outside off and Razzaq leaves it
back of length on middle, Razzaq goes on his toes and tucks it to deep square leg
bouncer angled into Akmal, he leaves and it's too high
angled into Akmal from outside off, he defends it to point
angled in towards off stump from back of length, he stays back and turns it to the leg side
full outside off, Razzaq drives but ABD at point dives to his right to save a few runs
outside off and he cuts it late fine on the off side past the keeper
flighted on middle, tucks it to square leg for one
quicker on the pads, Razzaq flicks but can't connect
full toss on off, driven down past the bowler for a single
flighted outside off, Akmal leans forward and turns it on the leg side
legspinner outside off goes past the outside edge as Razzaq defends
short and wide, Akmal guides it to third man
angled into the pads, Razzaq drives and manages it down the leg side off his pads and de Kock can't collect it. Razzaq wanted a double but Akmal said no
back of length coming in, defends on leg with soft hands for a quick single
short angled into him goes down the leg side for a wide
full outside off, Razzaq gets room and frees his arms to launch this over the covers for a four
almost in the block hole on off, driven back to the bowler
short of length outside off, pushed towards cover for one
outside off and he cuts it to sweeper cover for one off the back foot
flighted outside off, pushed back to Tahir

appeal for stumping now. It was flighted outside off, Akmal wanted to turn it on the leg side but missed as he came forward and de Kock took the bails off. Replays show that the batsman's toes are very close to the crease as the bails are taken off but they aren't very conclusive and the benefit of the doubt rules it in his favour
shorter on middle, steered to deep midwicket after the turn
flatter outside off, pushed towards point off the back foot
fuller on off, driven down to long-off
back of length outside off, Razzaq cuts it with some force and Amla at point dives to his right to save a few runs
what a shot from Akmal! He came down the ground and drove it over the bowler's head for six. McLaren pitched it up and Akmal cracked it for a six confidently
on length and coming in, Akmal defends it this time
short ball around off, pulled to deep midwicket for a single

Razzaq holes out when there was no need for such a shot. It was pitched short, there were fielders in the deep and he pulled, giving a catch to Miller at the wide long on boundary. As if Pakistan were not in trouble already
short ball angling away outside off, Tanvir sways out of the line
slightly full on the pads, steered on the leg side for one
flighted on middle and leg, Tanvir defends with soft hands
flighted outside off, pushed to cover and no time for a single

stumped off the wide again! Tahir pitched it down the leg side and it was turning away from Tanvir who wanted to work it on the leg side but came out of the crease while doing so and de Kock was alert to take the bails off
googly on length outside off, defends it to cover
fullish outside off, driven to long-off for one
short of length on middle and turning away, pushed down to long-on
angled in from outside off, worked to third man for one
short of length close to off, runs it down to third man
short ball going towards the leg side, Akmal helps it along the way to fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg off the pads
full on off, Akmal came down to push it to long-on
short ball outside off, Rehman wanted to work it to third man but it went past the outside edge
back of length outside off, Akmal cuts to point for a quick single
slower ball outside off, Rehman defends with soft hands to give the strike back to Akmal
short ball outside off and it's swinging away, Akmal reaches out without any footwork and can't connect
short ball makes Akmal uncomfortable but this one lands right between midwicket and deep square leg as he pulled
short one again and angling away form Rehman, it goes past the outside edge
bouncer on the leg stump, Rehman ducks under this one
short ball, Akmal takes his left leg out of the way and smacked it to the deep midwicket boundary after a bounce
short again, this time outside off and he guides it well over backward point for another four. No time for third man to get there
full toss outside off, Akmal punches it through the covers and scampers back for the second as the throw isn't accurate
in the block hole, Akmal digs it back to Parnell and he sees that Rehman is way out of his crease but doesn't go for the direct hit
full toss again outside off, driven firmly to deep cover for one
short of length outside off, Rehman pushes towards point and they take a quick single by the time Amla throws it back
outside off, Rehman sends it down to long-off and gives Akmal the strike
slower ball on length outside off, Akmal want for the big hit but got an inside edge towards deep midwicket
short ball at 144.6kph, Rehman can't get the pull away but they take a single as du Plessis can't collect it cleanly at midwicket
back of length angled into the stumps, Akmal makes room and lofts it down the ground to long on for one

short ball, Rehman can't connect but Akmal started for the single as soon as the ball was delivered and Rehman runs too. De Kock gets a direct hit and Akmal falls well short. A fighting 49 from Akmal comes to an end
Steyn gets the of stump! Pitches it slightly short on off, it was going straight as Ajmal tries to scoop it on leg by coming across and missed it completely
